comment: This is a rectangular text box containing classical Chinese characters in seal script and accompanying explanations in regular script. The layout includes vertical columns of text, with the main heading "文十七 重四" (Text Seventeen, Duplicate Four) centered. The leftmost column contains seal script characters with their meanings and phonetic annotations, while the right columns contain definitions, etymologies, and pronunciation notes using traditional Chinese lexicographic format (e.g., '从反丿' for structure, '普班切' for phonetic transcription).
